comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Definitely requires more then the default amount of memory (512KB) to do 300 dpi Ghostscript printing; should work flawlessly with 1.5MB or over.

Works fine at 150dpi with the default memory size.

Consumables/Refills: 92275A
